name: CanniBouncyBalls
description:
Eat the smaller bouncy balls before the bigger ones eat you! Get to 100% to win the game. There is no reward besides knowing you are the most cannibouncyballistic!

Controls:

Left/Right = Move

Hold Up to bounce higher

Hold Down to bounce lower

This was my first attempt to make a game in Unity instead of GameMaker: Studio. The learning curve is definitely steep at first but I think I'm getting the hang of it.
